testCase.name: LoginForm Component should render the form and submit data successfully
LoginForm Component should display server-side validation errors for name and password
LoginForm Component should show a loading spinner while submitting
SignupForm Component should render the form and submit data successfully
SignupForm Component should display server-side validation errors
SignupForm Component should show a loading spinner while submitting
ThemeSwitcher should render the theme switcher button
ThemeSwitcher should call setTheme with "light" when the "Light" option is clicked
ThemeSwitcher should call setTheme with "dark" when the "Dark" option is clicked
ThemeSwitcher should call setTheme with "system" when the "System" option is clicked
ThemeSwitcher should call setTheme with "high-contrast" when the "High Contrast" option is clicked
ThemeSwitcher should call setTheme with "high-contrast-dark" when the "High Contrast Dark" option is clicked
ThemeSwitcher should call setTheme with "crimson-red" when the "Crimson Red" option is clicked
ThemeSwitcher should call setTheme with "ocean-blue" when the "Ocean Blue" option is clicked
ThemeSwitcher should call setTheme with "hacker-green" when the "Hacker Green" option is clicked
ThemeSwitcher should call setTheme with "fluffy-pink" when the "Fluffy Pink" option is clicked
ThemeSwitcher should call setTheme with "baby-blue" when the "Baby Blue" option is clicked
AddBookForm Component should submit the form successfully and call the addBook prop
AddBookForm Component should handle server-side errors on submission
AddBookForm Component should disable progress input when wishlist is checked
AddBookForm Component should show "mark all as finished" when "add series" is checked
DropdownMenu Component should open, handle item clicks, and close the menu
DropdownMenu Component should toggle checkbox items correctly
DropdownMenu Component should handle radio item selection correctly
Popover Component should open on trigger click and close on a subsequent click
Popover Component should close when a user clicks outside the popover content
Popover Component should close when the Escape key is pressed
Command Component should open, filter items, and select an item with a click
Command Component should display the empty state when no items match
Command Component should navigate with arrow keys and select with Enter
BookCard Component should render the card and handle wishlisting
BookCard Component should update page progress
BookCard Component should handle deleting the book
LogoutButton Component should open the alert dialog when the logout button is clicked
LogoutButton Component should close the dialog when the cancel button is clicked
LogoutButton Component should call deleteSession and toast.promise on confirmation
AddBookButton Component should open the dialog and switch between search and add-book views
AddBookButton Component should call the addBook prop and close the dialog when a book is added
AddBookButton Component should keep the dialog open if the "keep open" checkbox is checked
Generic Form Components should render correctly and link elements with ARIA attributes on initial load
Generic Form Components should display a validation error message and update ARIA attributes upon invalid submission
Generic Form Components should not display an error and should call onSubmit with valid data
Generic Form Components should clear the error message after correcting an invalid input
LoginButton Component should open the login dialog when the button is clicked
BookSearch Component should search for books and display the results after a delay
BookSearch Component should handle selecting a book from the results
BookSearch Component should display an empty list when no books are found
AlertDialog Component should open, display content, and close via the cancel button
AlertDialog Component should trigger the action and close when the action button is clicked
AlertDialog Component should close when the Escape key is pressed
Select Component should open, select an option, and update the value correctly
Dialog Component should open and close with the trigger and footer button
Dialog Component should close when the Escape key is pressed
Dialog Component should close when clicking the default X close button
Tooltip should be hidden on initial render
Tooltip should show on hover and hide on unhover
Checkbox Component should toggle between checked and unchecked states when clicked
Checkbox Component should be checked when associated label is clicked
Checkbox Component should be disabled when the disabled prop is true
Button Component should render a button and handle clicks
Button Component should be disabled when the disabled prop is true
Button Component should render with the default variant
Button Component should render with the destructive variant
Button Component should render with the outline variant
Button Component should render with the secondary variant
Button Component should render with the ghost variant
Button Component should render with the link variant
Button Component should render with the default size
Button Component should render with the sm size
Button Component should render with the lg size
Button Component should render with the icon size
Button Component should render as a different component when asChild is true
Sonner should send toast
Sonner should send toast with description
Progress Component should render the progress bar with the correct value
Progress Component should default to 0 when no value is provided
Progress Component should update the progress when the value prop changes
Progress Component should handle a value of 0 correctly
Progress Component should handle a value of 100 correctly
PurchaseOptionsFetcher Component should show a loading state initially, then display fetched purchase options
PurchaseOptionsFetcher Component should display a message when no purchase options are found
PurchaseOptionsFetcher Component should display an error message if fetching fails
PurchaseOptionsFetcher Component should render nothing if the book is not wishlisted
Input Component should render and allow text to be entered
Input Component should be disabled when the disabled prop is true
Input Component should apply custom class names
Input Component should render with the correct type attribute
BookDisplay Component should render books and the add button for the owner
BookDisplay Component should show the owner-specific empty state when there are no books
BookDisplay Component should show the visitor-specific empty state and hide the add button for visitors
BookDisplay Component should render a series as a link
Card Component should render all parts of the card with the correct content
Card Component should apply custom class names to card components
Label Component should render its children as its content
Label Component should focus the associated input field when clicked
Label Component should apply custom class names
Separator should render a horizontal separator by default
Separator should render a vertical separator when specified
Separator should apply additional custom classes
Alert Component should render a default alert with a title and description
Alert Component should render the destructive variant correctly
Alert Component should render an icon when provided
Alert Component should apply custom class names
Skeleton should render with the default skeleton classes
Skeleton should apply additional custom classes
Skeleton should forward other HTML attributes
